channel.title: The CoReACTER
channel.description: Organization website for the Community of Researchers Assessing Chemical Transformations and Exploring Reactivity (CoReACTER)

item.title: CoReACTER Publications
item.description: Scholarly works published by the CoReACTER. This page is updated regularly with any papers published by the CoReACTER as an organization. Note that not all papers with ReACTERs as authors will be included here. For a complete list of publications by EWCSS, you can check out their website.
item.content:encoded:
This page is regularly updated with any papers published by the CoReACTER as an organization. Note that not all papers with ReACTERs as authors will be included here, but only papers borne out of CoReACTER projects. For a complete list of publications by EWCSS, you can check out their website.

Bibliography

Download all publications as BibTeX.

Forthcoming

2) Considering the Ethics of Large Machine Learning Models in the Chemical Sciences. Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith. In Review, 2025.

Preprints

Peer-Reviewed

1) The Open Molecules 2025 (OMol25) Dataset, Evaluations, and Models. Daniel S. Levine*, Muhammed Shuaibi*, Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith, Michael G. Taylor, Muhammad R. Hasyim, Kyle Michel, Ilyes Batatia, Gábor Csányi, Misko Dzamba, Peter Eastman, Nathan C. Frey, Xiang Fu, Vahe Gharakhanyan, Aditi S. Krishnapriyan, Joshua A. Rackers, Sanjeev Raja, Ammar Rizvi, Andrew S. Rosen, Zachary Ulissi, Santiago Vargas, C. Lawrence Zitnick, Samuel M. Blau, Brandom M. Wood. arXiv, 2025.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith
